content: the picnic folks top is a summer shirt that is knit top down with a pseudo-saddle shoulder construction first neckline shaping is done by knitting flat back-and-forth with lacework on the shoulders the neckline is then joined in the round the yoke is knit in the round with shoulder and yoke increases then split for sleeves and body the body is knit in the round to desired length the sleeves are picked up and knit to short-sleeve length all hems are finished with i-cord bind off **skill level ** advanced-beginner to intermediate **garment bust circumferences** sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 \ 7 8 9\ centimetres 79 89 99 109 119 130 \ 140 150 160\ inches 31 35 39 43 47 51 \ 55 59 63\ the top is designed to have about 5 cm 2 inches of positive ease around the bust **suggested yarn** oh folks co cloud cotton 5-ply worsted weight 60% cotton 40% acrylic blend 200 m per 100 g ball if you wish to use a yarn substitute have similar plant/synthetic fibre content to achieve the correct drape and breathability yarn quantities 2 3 3 4 4 5 \ 5 6 6\ balls **needles and gauge** 4 5 mm for stockinette 5 mm for bind off using 4 5 mm needles in stockinette 19 stitches and 24 row = 10 cm by 10 cm swatch
